sampleJob.title: Senior Frontend Developer
sampleJob.description: We are looking for an experienced Frontend Developer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining high-quality web applications using modern technologies.
responsibilities: Develop user-facing features using React and TypeScript
Build reusable components and front-end libraries
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Collaborate with backend developers and designers
Ensure technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of professional experience with React
Strong proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript
Experience with state management (Redux, Context API)
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and GraphQL
Understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility
benefits: Health insurance for you and family

moreJobs.title: Backend Developer
moreJobs.description: Join our backend team to build scalable and robust server-side applications.
qualifications: Experience with Express.js or similar frameworks

moreJobs.title: UI/UX Designer
moreJobs.description: Create beautiful and intuitive user experiences for our products.
responsibilities: Design user interfaces for web and mobile applications
Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with developers and product managers
Maintain design system and style guides
qualifications: Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Understanding of design principles and best practices

moreJobs.title: DevOps Engineer
moreJobs.description: Manage and optimize our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines.
qualifications: Strong knowledge of AWS or Azure

moreJobs.title: Product Manager
moreJobs.description: Lead product strategy and execution for our flagship products.
responsibilities: Work with engineering and design teams

moreJobs.title: Marketing Manager
moreJobs.description: Drive marketing strategy and campaigns to grow our brand.
responsibilities: Collaborate with sales and product teams
qualifications: Strong understanding of SEO and SEM

shortlisted.adminNotes: Strong technical background. Schedule technical interview.

interview.adminNotes: Interview scheduled for next Monday at 10 AM.

rejected.adminNotes: Not a good fit for current requirements.
